By Creating a passcode, you agree to our Terms & Condition and Privacy Policy Add money Send money Request money Your PayWell account has been created Done Create a passcode Confirm a passcode for your PayWell account Type of Document Submit document which proves that you live in Bangladesh Continue Email succesfully verified Your account is now even more secure Verify your NID again Retake your selfie again My details are captured properly Take a new picture Almost there! We just need to verify your identity to protect our community against financial crimes. It should only take a minute or two. You will be able to transfer money to any one and pay for any product or service after this verification. Verify identity Top up your account with ৳500 or more Before we hook you up with an account, you need to top up. You can spend or withdraw this money later. Lost access to your number? All money deposited or transferred to the following account will be available in your PayWell account. Specify user name, mobile
number & email A dedicated expense management tool can save you a huge amount of time and effort, not to mention keeping your team happy. This is especially true if:

You have travelling salespeople and need to track their spending on the road (for example, accommodation, travel, and other expenses). Business expense management
now made super easy Smart reconciliation with receipts You and your team are struggling to keep track of receipts, making reconciling expenses a monthly
nightmare.
If any of this sounds familiar, you really should think about using our expense management module. Departments You need to enter your organization's cost center codes i.e. GL codes according to your chart of accounts where the expenses will be debited or credited. Your organization’s chart of accounts Save & close Save & go to organogram I need claimant’s line manager and
other approvers to facilitate
re-imbursement. I/my deputy will approve all expenses Claimant profiles Please add the users who will be able to claim their expenses. you may also create & upload a user list using bulk upload. For links with expiry Reminders for payment links Customers will receive email or SMS only if the details are mentioned during the creation of a payment link Add reminder For links without expiry Advanced settings Save changes Reminders will be sent to customers between 11AM - 12PM and 3PM - 5PM. You can turn ON/OFF reminders for any individual customer. Money is money, but how you collect and organize those funds counts. Especially if you’re just starting out, maintaining a positive cash flow can make or break your business. Luckily, with PayWell for business, we have you covered with the easiest solution for invoicing,
tightly integrated with payments. Efficient invoicing Select a printer Utility bill payment PayWell Fees © 2020 CloudWell Limited CloudWell (Company No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Firm Reference 900562). Registered address: Skill House, Shahjadpur Gulshan, Dhaka. CloudWell Limited is an Appointed Representative of Lending Works Ltd (for the activity of “operating an electronic system for lending” only) and CloudWell (for the purposes of designated investment business only). Transaction information is available through the PayWell app for six years after you close your account. If you need to keep a copy of the information after then, you will need to download it. You can download information from the app at any time. No transactions Controlling your spending can feel like hard work, but we’ve done everything to make it easier. Set up a budget for all your sepending and we’ll track your prograss in real-time, ensuring you stick spending tragets. Budgeting controls From restaurants to groceries, set up a monthly sepnding budget for all kinds of things. As soon as you get close to your budget, we’ll ping you a message to help keep you on track Budgeting categories Set up your monthly budget Add new Vault Baby’s Birthday fund? India Trip? Guve your Vault a name... Daily budget reminders If you need a little help sticking to your daily budget, our handy reminders should keep you on track. With instant updates, you’ll know how much you have left to spend, when you’re nearing your daily limit, or when you’ve overspent. Think of it as your monthly budget, broken down into manageable slices! ‘Baby’s Birthday’ Vault has been created One-off saving Fund Info Terms & conditions PayWell will never store any your sensitive data and all your information is always secure using the highest level of encryption. Simple, private and secure We need your permission Your security is our priority. In order for us to offer this service, we need your permission to access the following account information: Your account details This includes your account name, account details, and balance PDF Excel CSV To be available soon Scan Pay Withdraw Spre change accelerator Create Vault You will save approximately ৳300.30 per month When you use the Spare Change Accelerator, you can multiply the change from each payment you make with your PayWell card by 2,3,4 or even 10 times the original amount - which means you’ll fill your Vault even faster. Recurring transfer Frequency Edit recurring transfer Set up a recurring transfer for any amount to your vault - daily, weekly or monthly Your recurring payment of ৳500 will be deactivated. You will be able to activate it at any time later. Dactivate recurring payment? Delete recurring payment test? Your recurring payment of ৳500 will be deleted permanently.
